changelog: Fixed quality profile toggle to properly display quality badges in emails
Added monitored/unmonitored toggle - Filter items based on monitoring status in Sonarr/Radarr
Improved update button with smart polling - Detects when update completes instead of fixed 20s wait
Changed 'Downloaded This Week' to 'Downloaded Last Week' for better accuracy
Quality profiles now properly stored in SeriesGroup for reliable display
Update process polls server every 2 seconds with 2-minute timeout
Monitored toggle allows showing only items that will be auto-downloaded
